task.prompt: Sam invested $10,000 and earned 20% interest compounded for 3 years. He then invested more until he had three times as much invested. The next year, he got a 15% return on his investment. How much money does he have now?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Sam invested $10,000 and earned 20% interest compounded for 3 years. He then invested more until he had three times as much invested. The next year, he got a 15% return on his investment. How much money does he have now?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
